# Chief of Naval Staff (Nigeria)

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Jump to navigation Jump to search

The **Chief of Naval Staff** is the highest ranking [military
officer](/wiki/Military_officer "Military officer") of the [Nigerian
Navy](/wiki/Nigerian_Navy "Nigerian Navy").[1] The position is often occupied
by the most senior [commissioned officer](/wiki/Commissioned_officer
"Commissioned officer") appointed by the [Commander-in-Chief of the Armed
Forces of Nigeria](/wiki/President_of_Nigeria "President of Nigeria").The
Chief of Naval Staff reports to the [Chief of Defence
Staff](/wiki/Chief_of_the_Defence_Staff_\(Nigeria\) "Chief of the Defence
Staff \(Nigeria\)"), who also reports to the [Defence
Minister](/wiki/Defence_Minister_of_Nigeria "Defence Minister of Nigeria").[2]
The Statutory duty of the Officer is to formulate and execute policies towards
the highest attainment of National Security and operational competence of the
Nigerian Navy.[3] The current Chief of Naval Staff is [Ibok Ekwe
Ibas](/wiki/Ibok_Ekwe_Ibas "Ibok Ekwe Ibas") who was appointed on July 13,
2015 by President [Muhammadu Buhari](/wiki/Muhammadu_Buhari "Muhammadu
Buhari") to succeeded [Usman Oyibe Jibrin](/wiki/Usman_Oyibe_Jibrin "Usman
Oyibe Jibrin").[4]

  

## Chiefs of Naval
Staff[[edit](/w/index.php?title=Chief_of_Naval_Staff_\(Nigeria\)&action=edit&section=1
"Edit section: Chiefs of Naval Staff")]

Table below is a chronological list of officers holding the position of Chief
of Naval Staff (CNS).[5]

Officer  | Title  | Period Served  | Remarks   
---|---|---|---  
Captain F.W. Skutil  | CNS  | 1956–1958  |   
Commodore A.R. Kennedy  | CNS  | 1958 –1964  |   
Vice Commodore [J.E.A. Wey](/wiki/Joseph_Edet_Akinwale_Wey "Joseph Edet Akinwale Wey") OFR FSS  | CNS  | 1964 –1973  |   
Vice Admiral [N.B. Soroh](/w/index.php?title=Nelson_Bossman_Soroh&action=edit&redlink=1 "Nelson Bossman Soroh \(page does not exist\)") MFR FSS IDC  | CNS  | 1973–1975  |   
Vice Admiral [M.A Adelanwa](/w/index.php?title=Michael_Ayinde_Adelanwa&action=edit&redlink=1 "Michael Ayinde Adelanwa \(page does not exist\)") [GCON](/wiki/Order_of_the_Niger "Order of the Niger") FSS rcds  | CNS  | 1975–1980  |   
Vice Admiral [A.A. Aduwo](/wiki/Akintunde_Aduwo "Akintunde Aduwo") [CFR](/wiki/Order_of_the_Federal_Republic "Order of the Federal Republic") FSS FBIM  | CNS  | 1980 - 1983  |   
Rear Admiral [A.A. Aikhomu](/wiki/Augustus_Aikhomu "Augustus Aikhomu") FSS psc [mni](/wiki/National_Institute_for_Policy_and_Strategic_Studies "National Institute for Policy and Strategic Studies") | CNS  | 1984 -1986  |   
Vice Admiral [Patrick Koshoni](/wiki/Patrick_Koshoni "Patrick Koshoni") FSS psc [mni](/wiki/National_Institute_for_Policy_and_Strategic_Studies "National Institute for Policy and Strategic Studies") | CNS  | 1986 -1990  |   
Vice Admiral [Murtala Nyako](/wiki/Murtala_Nyako "Murtala Nyako") FSS psc [mni](/wiki/National_Institute_for_Policy_and_Strategic_Studies "National Institute for Policy and Strategic Studies") | CNS  | 1990 - 1992  |   
Vice Admiral [D.P.E Omotsola](/w/index.php?title=Dan_Preston_Omotsola&action=edit&redlink=1 "Dan Preston Omotsola \(page does not exist\)") FSS DSO psc rcds  | CNS  | 1992 - 1993  |   
Rear Admiral [Suleiman Saidu](/wiki/Suleiman_Saidu "Suleiman Saidu") FSS LSS MSS DSS rcds  | CNS  | September 1993 - November 1993  |   
Rear Admiral [A.A. Madueke](/wiki/Allison_Madueke "Allison Madueke") FSS DSS MRNI [mni](/wiki/National_Institute_for_Policy_and_Strategic_Studies "National Institute for Policy and Strategic Studies") | CNS  | 1993- 1994  |   
Rear Admiral [O.M Akhigbe](/wiki/Mike_Akhigbe "Mike Akhigbe") FSS DSS psc [mni](/wiki/National_Institute_for_Policy_and_Strategic_Studies "National Institute for Policy and Strategic Studies") | CNS  | 1994 - 1998  |   
Vice Admiral [J. Ayinla](/w/index.php?title=Jubril_Ayinla&action=edit&redlink=1 "Jubril Ayinla \(page does not exist\)") DSS psc Usnwc fwc [GCON](/wiki/Order_of_the_Niger "Order of the Niger") | CNS  | 1998 - 1999  |   
Vice Admiral [V.K. Ombu](/w/index.php?title=Victor_Ombu&action=edit&redlink=1 "Victor Ombu \(page does not exist\)") CFR [mni](/wiki/National_Institute_for_Policy_and_Strategic_Studies "National Institute for Policy and Strategic Studies") | CNS  | 1999 - 2001  |   
Vice Admiral [S.O. Afolayan](/w/index.php?title=Samuel_Afolayan&action=edit&redlink=1 "Samuel Afolayan \(page does not exist\)") DSS psc fwc  | CNS  | 2001 - 2005  |   
Vice Admiral [G.T.A. Adekeye](/w/index.php?title=Ganiyu_Adekeye&action=edit&redlink=1 "Ganiyu Adekeye \(page does not exist\)") DSS psc mirss [mni](/wiki/National_Institute_for_Policy_and_Strategic_Studies "National Institute for Policy and Strategic Studies") | CNS  | 2005 - 2008  |   
Vice Admiral I.I. Ibrahim CFR DSS psc fwc  | CNS  | 2008 - 2010  |   
Vice Admiral [O.S. Ibrahim](/wiki/Ola_Ibrahim "Ola Ibrahim") DSS psc rcds fwc LLB (Hons) MA  | CNS  | 2010 - 2012  |   
Vice Admiral [D.J. Ezeoba](/wiki/Dele_Joseph_Ezeoba "Dele Joseph Ezeoba") GSS fwc Msc MRIN FCIS  | CNS  | 2012 - 2013  |   
Vice Admiral [U.O. Jibrin](/wiki/Usman_Oyibe_Jibrin "Usman Oyibe Jibrin") GSS AM psc+ [mni](/wiki/National_Institute_for_Policy_and_Strategic_Studies "National Institute for Policy and Strategic Studies") LLB PGCPA  | CNS  | 2013- 2015  |   
Rear Admiral [Ibok-Ete Ekwe Ibas ](/wiki/Ibok_Ekwe_Ibas "Ibok Ekwe Ibas") | CNS  | July 2015 –  |
